thread.section_title: WSJ Life, Style & Arts: Weekend News and Reads
thread.title: The Frenchman Who Could Ruin Norway’s Winter

author: Sara Germano
title: The Frenchman Who Could Ruin Norway’s Winter
text:
Six-time overall World Cup biathlon champion Martin Fourcade fired off five clean shots in the final shooting phase of a pursuit race in Oberhof, Germany last month. Then he did something highly unusual.
Instead of immediately digging in his ski poles and taking off on the final lap of the 12.5-kilometer race, the Frenchman whipped around and stared down Emil Hegle Svendsen for a full second as the Norwegian continued shooting.
“Yesterday...
